casebody.data:
UNITED STATES of America, Appellee, v. John ISOLA, alias John Idolda, alias John Mayo, Appellant. No. 77. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Oct. 15, 1934. Abraham Solomon, of New York City, for appellant. Leo J. Hickey, U. S. Atty., of Brooklyn, N. Y. (Vine H. Srniih, Asst. U. S. Atty., of New York City, and Emanuel Bublick, Asst. U. S. Atty., of Brooklyn, N. Y., of counsel), for the United States.

Before MANTON, L. HAND, and SWAN, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed.
